title: Wish

abstract: Winner - Best Overall Secondary School Entry. "What do you wish for?".
description: A young girl is transported into a fantasy world where her birthday wishes manifest into something beyond her control. This film questions the importance we place on superficial and materialistic desires.  Under the category 'Best Overall Secondary School Entry', Year 12, Presbyterian Ladies' College, Peppermint Grove, WA, were the Screen It 2012 winners.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002642; 'Screen It' 2012 [winning entries]; Active; 2012
